description: This CD-ROM has been designed as a learning and reference tool. The content has beeen selected to fulfil the requirements of most senior high school and introductory university courses in biology. Using the most recent research from universities, it features textual as well as audio and video information to explain concepts and theories, it also includes electron micrographs containing highlighted sections of diagrams, a dictionary of all terms used in the text and hypertext linked information. Includes detail on cell structure, photosynthesis, absorption of nutrients, molecular biology, reproduction, genetics, evolution and more...
